title: Error on Cray Milan system, "Could not determine a platform for this machine"

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
I am testing Spack on a Cray (centos:8) machine with Milan CPUs (AMD EPYC 7713 64-Core Processor). Spack produces the following error message with any command. 

### Error Messages  
```console
$ spack --debug --stacktrace find 
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/util/executable.py:188 ==> [2021-05-05-13:09:03.100362] '/bin/bash' '--norc' '--noprofile' '-lc' 'echo $CRAY_CPU_TARGET'
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py:777 ==> [2021-05-05-13:09:03.123136] NoPlatformError: Could not determine a platform for this machine.
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/error.py:55 ==> [2021-05-05-13:09:03.145271] Error: Could not determine a platform for this machine.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 751, in main
    setup_main_options(args)
  File "/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 451, in setup_main_options
    spack.config.set('config:debug', True, scope='command_line')
  File "/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/config.py", line 906, in set
    return config.set(path, value, scope)
  File "/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/lang.py", line 762, in __getattr__
    return getattr(self.instance, name)
  File "/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/lang.py", line 752, in instance
    self._instance = self.factory()
  File "/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/config.py", line 805, in _config
    _add_platform_scope(cfg, ConfigScope, name, path)
  File "/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/config.py", line 758, in _add_platform_scope
    platform = spack.architecture.platform().name
  File "/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/lang.py", line 207, in _memoized_function
    func.cache[args] = func(*args)
  File "/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/architecture.py", line 523, in _platform
    return platform_cls()
  File "/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/platforms/cray.py", line 61, in __init__
    raise NoPlatformError()
spack.architecture.NoPlatformError: Could not determine a platform for this machine.
```

_This only applies to spack develop branch including and after the_
```
commit 8cf6ad99170a64becb932c6e4c255c8adf4230c2 (HEAD)
Author: Massimiliano Culpo <massimiliano.culpo@gmail.com>
Date: Thu Mar 18 08:23:09 2021 +0100
 
archspec: update to latest version (#22357)
```

An update to archspec has caused an issue. I have raised this bug here and will also raise this issue in archspec. 

For reference, using the commit just before the update to arch spec gives 
```console
$ git checkout 4c9c5393f1fad00b7e8c77661a02b236db2d0e40
$ spack --version 
0.16.1-1746-4c9c5393f1
$ spack --debug --stacktrace find
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/util/executable.py:182 ==> [2021-05-05-13:12:25.484080] '/bin/bash' '--norc' '--noprofile' '-lc' 'echo $CRAY_CPU_TARGET'
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/platforms/cray.py:154 ==> [2021-05-05-13:12:25.509091] default to front-end architecture
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/__init__.py:122 ==> [2021-05-05-13:12:25.574501] Imported find from built-in commands
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/__init__.py:122 ==> [2021-05-05-13:12:25.575478] Imported find from built-in commands
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/config.py:969 ==> [2021-05-05-13:12:25.578582] Reading config file /group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py:364 ==> [2021-05-05-13:12:25.634373] DATABASE LOCK TIMEOUT: 3s
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py:368 ==> [2021-05-05-13:12:25.634652] PACKAGE LOCK TIMEOUT: No timeout
/group/pawsey0001/pelahi/amd-milan-tests/codes/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/find.py:253 ==> [2021-05-05-13:12:25.638857] 3 installed packages
-- cray-cnl6-haswell / gcc@7.2.0 --------------------------------
mpich@7.7.0  netlib-scalapack@2.1.0  openblas@0.3.9
```

### Information on your system

Spack reports (for versions pre the commit that breaks spack)
```console
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** <=0.16.1-1746-4c9c5393f1
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** cray-centos8-zen2
* **Concretizer:** original
```

At the commit 
```console 
./bin/spack debug report
* **Spack:** >=0.16.1-1747-8cf6ad9917
* **Python:** 3.6.8
==> Error: Could not determine a platform for this machine.
```

### Additional information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [x] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
